The defendants claim that they terminated Dr. Bikofsky because they were losing tens of millions of dollars per year and management was directed to make cuts. Dr. Bikofsky was one of many medical personnel terminated. The defendants filed a motion for summary judgment which was denied by the Trial Court in its entirety. This short opinion really contains every essential argument that should be made by plaintiffs at summary judgment.

Dr. Niket Mamaniya practices at Dr.Niket Mamaniya Dental Clinic in Malad, Mumbai. He completed BDS from Y.M.T dental college and hospital,kharghar, navi mumbai in 2010. He is a member of Indian Dental Association. Some of the services provided by the doctor are: Conscious Sedation,BPS Dentures Fixing,Crowns and Bridges Fixing and Impaction / Impacted Tooth Extraction etc.
